statements: SELECT * FROM personalized_quizzes;
SELECT quiz_name, quiz_topic FROM personalized_quizzes;
SELECT quiz_name, number_of_questions FROM personalized_quizzes WHERE quiz_topic = 'Math';
SELECT * FROM personalized_quizzes WHERE number_of_questions > 10;
SELECT DISTINCT quiz_topic FROM personalized_quizzes;
SELECT * FROM personalized_quizzes ORDER BY quiz_id DESC;
SELECT quiz_name, quiz_topic FROM personalized_quizzes WHERE learning_goal = 'programming';
SELECT quiz_name, number_of_questions FROM personalized_quizzes WHERE quiz_topic = 'Math';
SELECT * FROM personalized_quizzes WHERE number_of_questions > 10 ORDER BY quiz_id ASC;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_quizzes, AVG(number_of_questions) AS avg_questions FROM personalized_quizzes;
SELECT * FROM quizzes WHERE quiz_id = 1;
SELECT quiz_name, quiz_topic FROM quizzes WHERE quiz_difficulty = 'Easy';
SELECT quiz_name, quiz_difficulty FROM quizzes WHERE quiz_topic = 'Science' ORDER BY quiz_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM user_goals WHERE user_id = 10;
SELECT * FROM user_goals WHERE assessment_progress > 0.5;
SELECT * FROM quizzes WHERE quiz_topic = 'History' ORDER BY quiz_id DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT quiz_name, quiz_difficulty FROM quizzes WHERE quiz_questions->>'$.length()' > 10;
SELECT quiz_name, quiz_topic FROM quizzes WHERE quiz_name LIKE '%Wars%' OR quiz_topic LIKE '%Wars%' ORDER BY quiz_topic ASC, quiz_name ASC;
SELECT quiz_id, quiz_name, quiz_difficulty FROM quizzes WHERE quiz_difficulty = 'Intermediate' ORDER BY quiz_id ASC LIMIT 10 OFFSET 5;
SELECT quiz_id, quiz_name, quiz_topic FROM quizzes WHERE quiz_questions->>'$[0].type' = 'Multiple Choice' ORDER BY quiz_id ASC LIMIT 3 OFFSET 2;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT quiz_name, topic FROM quizzes WHERE difficulty = 'Medium';
SELECT user_id, quiz_id, score FROM quiz_attempts WHERE score > 80;
SELECT user_id, quiz_id, score, attempt_date FROM quiz_attempts ORDER BY score DESC;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE username = 'JohnDoe' AND email = 'johndoe@example.com';
SELECT quiz_name FROM quizzes WHERE topic = 'Math' ORDER BY difficulty DESC;
SELECT user_id, quiz_id, MAX(score) FROM quiz_attempts GROUP BY user_id, quiz_id ORDER BY user_id ASC;
SELECT topic, COUNT(quiz_id) FROM quizzes GROUP BY topic HAVING COUNT(quiz_id) > 3;

SELECT u.username, q.quiz_name, qa.score FROM users u JOIN quiz_attempts qa ON u.user_id = qa.user_id JOIN quizzes q ON qa.quiz_id = q.quiz_id WHERE u.username LIKE '%Smith%' AND qa.score > 80 ORDER BY qa.score DESC;
SELECT * FROM learning_goals;
SELECT goal_name, description FROM learning_goals WHERE goal_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM quiz_questions ORDER BY question_id DESC;
SELECT question_text, correct_answer FROM quiz_questions WHERE learning_goal_id = 2;
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM user_profiles WHERE learning_goal_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM learning_goals WHERE goal_id = 1;
SELECT question_text, correct_answer FROM quiz_questions ORDER BY question_id DESC;
SELECT username, email FROM user_profiles WHERE learning_goal_id = 2;
SELECT response_id, user_answer FROM user_responses WHERE user_id = 3 AND question_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM user_profiles JOIN learning_goals ON user_profiles.learning_goal_id = learning_goals.goal_id;
SELECT * FROM User;
SELECT full_name, email FROM User WHERE learning_goal = 'Programming';
SELECT user_id, full_name, email, learning_goal FROM User WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM Quiz ORDER BY topic DESC;
SELECT quiz_name, difficulty FROM Quiz WHERE difficulty > 3;
SELECT * FROM User;
SELECT full_name, email FROM User WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT question_text, answer, difficulty FROM Question INNER JOIN Quiz ON Question.quiz_id = Quiz.quiz_id WHERE Quiz.difficulty > 3;
SELECT User.full_name, Quiz.quiz_name, UserQuizResult.score FROM User INNER JOIN UserQuizResult ON User.user_id = UserQuizResult.user_id INNER JOIN Quiz ON UserQuizResult.quiz_id = Quiz.quiz_id;
SELECT User.full_name, COUNT(UserQuizResult.result_id) AS num_attempts FROM User INNER JOIN UserQuizResult ON User.user_id = UserQuizResult.user_id GROUP BY User.full_name;
